ClassComponentBuilderFactory.title: Class
ClassComponentBuilderFactory.description: The Class component is for invoking Java classes (Java beans) from Camel.

BeanComponentBuilderFactory.title: Bean
BeanComponentBuilderFactory.description: The bean component is for invoking Java beans from Camel.
BeanComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,java

BrowseComponentBuilderFactory.title: Browse
BrowseComponentBuilderFactory.description: The browse component is used for viewing the messages received on endpoints that supports BrowsableEndpoint.
BrowseComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,monitoring

ControlBusComponentBuilderFactory.title: Control Bus
ControlBusComponentBuilderFactory.description: The controlbus component provides easy management of Camel applications based on the Control Bus EIP pattern.
ControlBusComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,monitoring

DataFormatComponentBuilderFactory.title: Data Format
DataFormatComponentBuilderFactory.description: The dataformat component is used for working with Data Formats as if it was a regular Component supporting Endpoints and URIs.
DataFormatComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,transformation

MockComponentBuilderFactory.title: Mock
MockComponentBuilderFactory.description: The mock component is used for testing routes and mediation rules using mocks.
MockComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,testing

DataSetComponentBuilderFactory.title: Dataset
DataSetComponentBuilderFactory.description: The dataset component provides a mechanism to easily perform load & soak testing of your system.
DataSetComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,testing

DataSetTestComponentBuilderFactory.description: The dataset-test component extends the mock component by on startup to pull messages from another endpoint to set the expected message bodies.

DirectComponentBuilderFactory.title: Direct
DirectComponentBuilderFactory.description: The direct component provides direct, synchronous call to another endpoint from the same CamelContext.
DirectComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,endpoint

DirectVmComponentBuilderFactory.title: Direct VM
DirectVmComponentBuilderFactory.description: The direct-vm component provides direct, synchronous call to another endpoint from any CamelContext in the same JVM.
DirectVmComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,endpoint

FileComponentBuilderFactory.title: File
FileComponentBuilderFactory.description: The file component is used for reading or writing files.

LanguageComponentBuilderFactory.title: Language

LogComponentBuilderFactory.title: Log
LogComponentBuilderFactory.description: The log component logs message exchanges to the underlying logging mechanism.

RefComponentBuilderFactory.title: Ref

RefComponentBuilderFactory.label: core,endpoint

RestApiComponentBuilderFactory.title: REST API

RestComponentBuilderFactory.title: REST
